title: Operation flash: an exercise, October 1977
creator_credit: Ingo Helbig, VicRail and Victorian Film Corporation
brief_description: Film report of a simulated rail accident in Parkville. Four wooden carriages are blocked in the subway and inflammable liquids have been spilt. The role of the fire brigade, the ambulance and the police is shown in coping with the accident.
creator_credit_for_label: Ingo Helbig, VicRail and Victorian Film Corporation
